name: B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin
description:
Set in Besançon, 6.5 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station, B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a bar. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 6.6 km from Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station.

At the hotel, the rooms include a wardrobe. At B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin all rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin offers a sun terrace.

Besançon-Mouillère train station is 7.7 km from the hotel, while Micropolis is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 59 km from B&B HOTEL Besançon Valentin.

name: hotelF1 Besancon Ouest Micropolis
description:
Hotelf1 Besancon Ouest Micropolis - offers accommodation in Besançon, 1 km from Micropolis Convention Centre. Free WiFi and free parking are provided on site.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a shared bathroom. Guests can purchase microfibre towels at the hotel at an extra cost of EUR 3 each.

A breakfast buffet is available every morning at an extra charge.

Hotelf1 Besancon Ouest Micropolis is a 20-minute drive from Besancon city centre and Saint-Jean Cathedral.

name: Accueil Hotel Besançon
description:
Set in Besançon, 4.4 km from Micropolis, Accueil Hotel Besançon offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 2-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is situated 7.9 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Besançon-Mouillère train station is 9 km from Accueil Hotel Besançon, while Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 53 km from the accommodation.

name: Campanile Besançon-Ouest Châteaufarine
description:
Part of the Campanile group, this hotel is situated 7 km west of the centre of Besancon. It offers a bar and a terrace. The hotel offers secure on-site parking, free high-speed WiFi access and a 24-hour reception.

The rooms feature satellite TV, free newspapers and a private bathroom. There is also a welcome tray in each room.

You will be able to dine in the on-site restaurant, which is open every day. A breakfast buffet including fresh fruit and pastries is served each morning and regional cuisine with a starter and dessert buffet is available for lunch and dinner.

Vesoul is 52 km from the property.  The nearest airport is Dole - Jura Airport, 53 km from the property.

name: Premiere Classe Besancon Ecole Valentin
description:
Close to Alsace and Jura, this hotel is easily accessible from the A36 motorway. It is situated in the village of Ecole-Valentin, a 5 minute drive from Besançon. Free WiFi is provided.

The Premiere Classe Besancon Ecole Valentin offers air-conditioned guest rooms. Each is equipped with a TV with satellite, Canal + and beIN Sports channels. The private bathroom includes a shower and towels.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning in the stylish breakfast room. Free private parking for cars and buses is provided on site.

The Première Classe Besançon is located in the Franche-Comté region. In the surrounding area guests can visit Besançon’s miroctechnics pole.

name: ibis budget Besançon Ecole Valentin
description:
The ibis budget Besançon Ecole Valentin is located just off the A36 motorway and 6 km from the centre of Besançon. It is 1 km from École-Valentin Train Station. The hotel offers free WiFi access throughout the property, free parking and newspapers in its lobby.

The rooms at ibis budget Besançon Ecole Valentin are decorated in a contemporary style and feature a flat-screen TV. Each one also has an en suite bathroom, which is complete with a shower.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning in the breakfast room. After breakfast you may choose to drive along the A36 motorway to Dijon or Montbéliard, both less than 50 minutes away.

Several restaurants and supermarkets can be found nearby and a wellness sports club is less than a 10-minutes' walk away from the hotel.

name: Hotel Campanile Besançon Nord Ecole Valentin
description:
The Campanile Besançon Valentin is located near the A36 motorway (exit Saint Claude) and 5.8 km from Besançon and Besançon Viotte TGV Station. It offers guestrooms with free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Campanile are equipped with flat-screen TVs with Canal+ channels and tea and coffee making facilities. Each includes a private bathroom, and family rooms are also available.

Guests can enjoy traditional French cuisine in the on-site restaurant, followed by a drink in the private bar. The hotel also provides a night porter.

Besançon, a hilly town with twisting streets dominated by a citadel, is known for its delightful setting and fine parks. The hotel is located between the new TGV station and the town centre.

name: Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City
description:
This Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City is located in Besançon and offers studios and apartments with free WiFi access. It is next to the Doubs River and 2 km from the town’s train station.

Accommodation at the Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City is serviced by a lift and has a living room with, free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV. Each apartment also has, wire internet access and a kitchenette equipped with a microwave.

Breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room. This residence also provides a bike storage room, laundry facilities, a garage and free Wi-Fi at the reception.

The Comfort Aparthotel Besancon La City is a 10-minute walk from the city centre and 1.5 km from the Cathedral Saint-Jean. A Tramway Station can be reached within a 2-minute walk and provides direct access to Besançon Viotte Train Station.

You have the possibility to luch here our take-away formulas consisting of a hot dish, a drink and a dessert. Choose from a wide selection of dishes and relax over a tasty meal.

name: Bali Suite
description:
Situated 2 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station and 3.2 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station in the centre of Besançon, Bali Suite features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Attractively set in the Besancon Old Town district, this aparthotel offers a bar, as well as spa facilities and wellness packages. The aparthotel provides a sun terrace and a 24-hour front desk.

The aparthotel consists of 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom and a living room. The accommodation is non-smoking.

There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available.

Bike hire and car hire are available at the aparthotel and the area is popular for cycling and hiking. Guests at Bali Suite can enjoy billiards on-site, or walking tours in the surroundings.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Time museum of Besançon, Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon and Museum of Fine Arts and Archaeology of Besancon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from Bali Suite.

name: Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa
description:
Logis Hôtel Victor Hugo & Spa offers accommodation 50 metres from Viotte train station and just 15 minutes' walking distance from the historic city centre of Besançon. Many rooms open onto an inner garden.

All the rooms come with ensuite facilities, satellite TV, a telephone and free WiFi access.

To get off to a good start you can enjoy your breakfast before heading out to experience the capital of the Franche-Comté region.

Several adjustable equipped meeting rooms are available onsite and can accommodate groups of up to 45 people.

Other onsite services available to guests aged 12 and above include a fitness room, a heated outdoor pool, a sauna, 2 hot tubs, a hammam, a sensorial shower and a relaxation room . Massages using Equatoria products.

Secure private parking is featured onsite.

name: Gîtes de l'Orée du Bois
description:
Offering a garden and garden view, Gîtes de l'Orée du Bois is situated in Boussières, 17 km from Besancon Viotte Train Station and 17 km from Besançon-Mouillère train station. The air-conditioned accommodation is 14 km from Micropolis. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi, free private parking and an electric vehicle charging station.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. All units have bed linen.

A selection of options including fresh pastries, fruits and juice is available for the continental breakfast. For those times when you'd rather not dine out, you can choose to cook on the barbecue.

Guests at the aparthotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Boussières, like walking tours. If you would like to discover the area, cycling, fishing and hiking are possible in the surroundings and Gîtes de l'Orée du Bois can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Besançon Franche-Comté TGV train station is 26 km from the accommodation, while Besançon Vesoul University is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 61 km from Gîtes de l'Orée du Bois.

name: Hôtel de La Vallée
description:
Located in Ornans, The Hôtel de La Vallée is just 200 metres from the city centre and La Loue River. The Gustave Courbet Museum is just 550 metres away.

With a view of the river or the Chateau d'Ornans, all rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a wardrobe. The en suite bathroom includes free toiletries and a shower.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning and can be enjoyed on the patio. The hotel's restaurant offers traditional dishes from the region.

Saint-Laurent Church is 800 metres away and Besançon is a 25-minute drive from the hotel. Additional features include free Wi-Fi access and free private parking on site.

name: Hotel Rose
description:
Composed of thoughtfully designed independent bungalows and guestrooms in the annex house of a 19th-century building, Hotel Rose offers comfortable accommodation and a peaceful atmosphere.

The residence is set in a verdant park full of trees and flowers. Some of the accommodation opens out onto the river that leads to the famous Mont Saint Michel and offer a tranquil, relaxing living space. All of the bungalows are independently ecological and can accommodate 4 people (or 5 on request).

Enjoy a tasty breakfast, a casual drink or a relaxing moment on the manor's veranda or under the shade of the trees.

Hotel Rose also features a shared living area with a piano, free Wi-Fi access, games and plenty of reading material. Nearby you can take quiet walks or bike rides and enjoy traditional and regional cuisine in one of the local restaurants.

name: ibis Besançon Marchaux
description:
Located in Marchaux, ibis Besançon Marchaux offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi access throughout and a restaurant. The A36 motorway is ideally located next to the hotel and gives direct access to Mulhouse and Beaune.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, desk, telephone and a wardrobe. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. Guests can also enjoy lunch or an evening meal in the on-restaurant.

Additional features include interconnecting rooms and rooms adapted for guests with reduced mobility. Micropolis Convention Centre is just a 20-minute drive away and free public parking is possible on site.


However, the hotel remains accessible to customers:
- From the Besançon Champoux rest area and the pedestrian bridge
- From outside the motorway, you will need to exit at exit 4.1 Besançon Est, follow Besançon Thise on the D486 then turn right towards La Carrière (Marchaux) and follow along the area to the end.

name: Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie
description:
Set in Roz-sur-Couesnon, within 11 km of Mont Saint Michel Abbey and 11 km of Mont Saint-Michel, Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie offers accommodation with a garden and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 28 km from Port of Houle, 31 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel and 33 km from The Pointe du Grouin. The hotel has a sun terrace and an indoor pool.

The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie, all rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie offers a children's playground. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Roz-sur-Couesnon, like hiking.

Palais du Grand Large is 43 km from Vacancéole - Les Chambres de la Baie, while Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 43 km away. The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 88 km from the accommodation.

name: Zanzibar Suite
description:
Zanzibar Suite features accommodation situated 800 metres from the centre of Besançon and offers a garden and a bar. This property offers access to a terrace, pool at the pool table, free private parking and free WiFi. The aparthotel has spa facilities and a 24-hour front desk.

The air-conditioned aparthotel consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and bathrobes. A flat-screen TV with streaming services is offered. The aparthotel offers bed linen, towels and housekeeping service.

Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy an à la carte breakfast, and breakfast in the room is also available. For visitors looking to embark on day trips to nearby landmarks, Zanzibar Suite provides a selection of packed lunches.

A variety of wellness packages are available for guests to get rejuvenated in-house. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Besançon, like walking tours. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Zanzibar Suite, while cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Besançon-Mouillère train station, Time museum of Besançon and Saint-Jean Cathedral Besançon. The nearest airport is Dole-Jura Airport, 64 km from Zanzibar Suite.

name: Hôtel Ariane & SPA
description:
This charming hotel sits at the border of Brittany and Normandy, just a 5-minute drive from the Mont-Saint-Michel. Set in a garden, it has an outdoor terrace and spacious rooms.

Each bedroom has a contemporary design, a TV and a telephone. The private bathrooms feature a bathtub and a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire Hotel Ariane.

The hotel has a wellness area for a fee.  The sessions can be privatized.

A full buffet breakfast is provided every morning in the cosy dining room with plants and stone walls.

Shuttles between Pontorson and Saint Malo are available for a small charge and leave from in front of the hotel. Hotel Ariane is 80 km from Rennes and 47 km from Saint Malo. Private parking is possible on site, at a surcharge.

name: Hôtel Le Lithana
description:
Located in the town centre of Pontorson, this hotel is just 10 km south of the famous Mont St-Michel. It offers a restaurant with a terrace and an interior courtyard. A private parking is at guests' disposal.

Guest rooms in this traditional Norman building have a simple décor and feature a balcony. Each heated guest room is equipped with a TV. Some rooms have access to a shared bathroom and some rooms have a private bathroom.

The restaurant at Le Lithana is open from Monday to Friday, and also features a bar. Breakfast including artisanal bread and pastries, is served every morning in the restaurant.

The hotel Le Lithana is 500 metres from Pontorson Train Station, shops and tourist office. It is accessible via the N176 motorway.

name: Hotel De France
description:
Just 100 metres from Pontorson Train Station, Hotel De France is just 10 km from the historic abbey on Mont Saint Michel. It offers guest rooms with a TV and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available in Hotel de France’s sister hotel, 30 metres away. Traditional, regional cuisine is also served there in the evenings.

With free public parking possible, guests can explore the seaside town of Granville, 48 km away. Saint-Malo is 45 km from Hotel de France.

name: Vacancéole - Le Domaine du Mont - Mont St Michel
description:
Located just 18 km from Mont Saint Michel in Roz-Sur-Couesnon,  Vacancéole Le Domaine du Mont offers a shaded outdoor terrace. Some of the rooms are air conditioned.

A flat-screen TV and free wired internet access are provided in all accommodations. Each room has its own bathroom with bath or shower.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning and a bakery delivery service is available. Drinks can be bought at the reception and you can have lunch or dinner in the nearby restaurants.

Vacancéole Le Domaine du Mont also has a children’s playground for younger guests. A heated indoor pool and a sauna are also featured at the residence.

Saint-Malo is 40 km from Vacancéole Le Domaine du Mont. Free WiFi access is available in the reception, while wired internet is provided in the rooms. Rennes Airport is 75 km from the property, while Pontorson Train Station is 8.6 km away.

name: Hôtel Victor Hugo
description:
Located in Pontorson, 10 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey, Hôtel Victor Hugo provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. The property is around 23 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel, 39 km from Port of Houle and 43 km from The Pointe du Grouin. The property is non-smoking and is set 10 km from Mont Saint-Michel.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms will provide you with a city view.

Solidor Tower is 45 km from Hôtel Victor Hugo, while Granville Train Station is 48 km away. The nearest airport is Rennes–Saint-Jacques Airport, 83 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Le XIV
description:
Offering an on-site restaurant, Hotel Le XIV is located in Pontorson. You can relax with a drink from the bar and surf the web using the free WiFi connection.

The rooms have parquet flooring, a flat-screen TV and a desk. You will have access to private or shared bathroom facilities.

Please note that the restaurant is temporarily closed until further notice. A continental breakfast is still available each morning, at an additional cost.

Free public parking is possible on site and the famous Mont Saint-Michel is located a 15-minute drive away.

name: The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud
description:
The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud is located just a 10-minute drive from Le Mont Saint Michel and a 35-minute drive from Saint Malo.

Each guest room at The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud is soundproofed and has satellite TV and a private bathroom.

The Originals Boutique, Hôtel Les Quatre Salines, Le Mont Saint-Michel Sud has a restaurant, which serves regional and traditional cuisine and seafood specialities, using fresh local produce.

The hotel provides a shuttle service between the hotel and Dol de Bretagne TGV station, Saint Malo TGV station, Dinard and Rennes Saint Jacques Airport. Free on-site parking is also available.

name: hotelF1 Avranches Baie Du Mont Saint Michel
description:
The hotel F1 Avranches Baie Du Mont Saint Michel is situated in Saint-Quentin-sur-Homme, 3 kilometres from Avranches and 17 kilometres from Mont St Michel. The hotel offers free parking.

The hotel has simple and comfortable rooms with a separate shower and toilet area. Guests can purchase microfibre towels at the hotel at an extra cost of EUR 3 each.

F1 Avranches Baie Du Mont Saint Michel also provides free Wi-Fi internet access.

The A84 highway, which connects Rennes to Caen, is easily accessible.

name: Hotel Des Bains
description:
Set in 400 m² of mature gardens, the Hotel des Bains is just 35 km from Mont Saint Michel, in the Mont-Saint-Michel Bay. It offers en suite accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool.

The guest rooms at Hotel Des Bains have a TV and a private bathroom equipped with a shower. Some rooms also have free WiFi access and a dryer is available on site for guests' convenience.

Breakfast can be delivered directly to guests’ rooms or selected from the buffet. The hotel’s restaurant serves traditional French cuisine featuring seafood. Guests can dine overlooking the swimming pool during warmer months.

Mont St Michel Bay is 750 metres from the hotel and 15 km from both Granville and Avranches. A free private parking and a garage for bicycles are available on site.

name: La Ramade - Teritoria
description:
Composed of 2 villas and situated 400 metres from Avranches Train Station in Mont Saint Michel's bay, La Ramade - Teritoria is a mansion surrounded by well-established gardens. It offers en suite rooms with free Wi-Fi.

All rooms at La Ramade - Teritoria are soundproofed. One of the villas has rooms with romantic feel and are decorated in a flower theme while the other offers contemporary-style rooms. Most rooms have views of the gardens or surrounding countryside and some are serviced by a lift.

Breakfast is served in a glass-roofed breakfast room that looks out onto a flowery garden. Le P’tit Bonheur provides beverages in a tea room and wine bar area.

The Mont Saint Michel is 20 km from La Ramade - Teritoria. The seaside town of Granville is 22 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel Patton
description:
This hotel is located in the heart of Avranches, 750 metres from the Jardin des Plantes and less than a 5-minute drive from motorway A84. It offers free Wi-Fi access.

Each guest room at the Hôtel Patton is in a contemporary design and is equipped with a TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a seating area.

A continental breakfast is served daily.The hotel also features a lift to take guests to their room.

It is just 17 km from Mont Saint Michel and a 48-minute drive to Rennes.

name: ibis budget Granville
description:
Located in Mont-Saint-Michel Bay, 3 km from Granville city centre with its shops and restaurants, this ibis hotel features free Wi-Fi and free private parking. A buffet breakfast is proposed every day.

Each room at the ibis Budget Granville includes a private bathroom with shower, LCD TV with satellite channels and free toiletries.

Ferries going to the Chausey Islands leave from Granville’s port, which is a 5-minute drive away. Mont Saint Michel is 40 km away and the A84 is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Altos Hotel & Spa
description:
Altos Hotel & Spa is located a 15-minute walk from the centre of Avranches, on the bay of Mont Saint-Michel. Featuring a contemporary and modern design, this boutique hotel also boasts spa access for an additional charge.

Rooms at Altos Hotel & Spa are equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom. They are all serviced by a lift.

A continental buffet breakfast is served daily at Altos Hotel & Spa.

The spa includes a hot tub, sauna and dry water massage beds for guests aged 18 years old and above.

The hotel is just 200 metres from the Avranches Aquatic Centre. Guests can also explore the Normandy coast and enjoy local water sports activities.

name: Ducey Appart'Hôtel - Les Rivières
description:
Set 25 km from Mont Saint Michel Abbey, 25 km from Mont Saint-Michel and 37 km from Granville Train Station, Ducey Appart'Hôtel - Les Rivières offers accommodation situated in Ducey. The property features city and quiet street views, and is 13 km from Scriptorial d'Avranches, musee des manuscrits du Mont Saint-Michel. The aparthotel has family rooms.

All units come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. With a private bathroom, units at the aparthotel also feature free WiFi. At the aparthotel, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

An à la carte breakfast is available every morning at the property and includes fresh pastries and juice.

Champrepus Zoo is 39 km from the aparthotel, while Granville's Marina is 39 km from the property.

name: Hotel Beau Rivage
description:
Hotel Beau Rivage is in Le Vivier-sur-Mer, 500 metres from the English Channel. Its terrace sits in a small garden where breakfast is served in the warmer months.

Homemade traditional and local cuisine is prepared and served in the hotel’s restaurant. The bar is open for afternoon and evening drinks.

Rooms at the Hotel Beau Rivage are soundproofed and have a private, en suite bathroom with a bath or shower. They also have flat-screen TV and free WiFi internet access.

Free secured parking is available on site and is under video surveillance. The famous Mont Saint Michel is just 31 km from the hotel and the Dol-de-Bretagne Train Station (TGV) is 7.5km away.

name: Hôtel du Musée
description:
Hôtel du Musée has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Granville. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 400 metres from Plat Gousset Beach.

All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The hotel features some units that have a safety deposit box, and the rooms are fitted with a private bathroom and a wardrobe.

Hôtel du Musée offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Herel Beach, Hacqueville Beach and Granville's Marina. The nearest airport is Caen–Carpiquet Airport, 103 km from Hôtel du Musée.

name: Hôtel de la Baie - Thalassothérapie PREVITHAL
description:
Featuring direct beach access, Hôtel de la Baie - Thalassothérapie PREVITHAL is located a 5-minute drive from the centre of Granville. Provided with free WiFi access, the property offers free access to the sauna and the salted water swimming pool with jets.

Each room features either sea or garden views. Rooms are equipped with a TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is available daily. You can enjoy other meals at the on-site restaurant, which has panoramic sea views. Free parking is possible on site.

name: Hotel Des Bains
description:
Built in 1881, this traditional hotel is in the seaside resort of Granville, just 20 metres from the beach. It offers en suite rooms with free Wi-Fi access and Canal+ channels.

All of the guest rooms at Hotel Des Bains are accessible by lift. Some rooms have a balcony and views of Mont Saint Michel bay.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and includes local products (jam, yogurt, cheese). Close to the hotel, the Granville Casino includes Le Purple Lounge bar and the Terranova restaurant.

The fishing port of Granville has a boat service to the Channel Islands of Great Britain. The Christian Dior Museum is 650 metres from the hotel. Granville Train Station is 1 km from Hotel Des Bains.

name: Hotel de la Gare
description:
Hotel de la Gare is located 50 metres from the train station in Dol-de-Bretagne and a public shuttle stop, which offers a direct service to Mont Saint-Michel. It is a 2-star property with an on-site bar and it 200 metres from the town centre and local restaurants. A parking lot for mobility-impaired guests is located 50m from the hotel.

The rooms at Hotel de la Gare are decorated in a simple style and include a flat-screen TV. Each one is also complete with free Wi-Fi access and an en suite bathroom.

A continental breakfast is available every morning in the hotel’s traditional-style dining room. You can also choose to have breakfast in the comfort of your guest room and read one of the newspapers.

Free public parking is available on site and Dol-de-Bretagne Cathedral is a 10-minute walk away. Other local attractions include the public swimming pool, 200 metres away and the towns of Saint-Malo and Dinan, both 30 km from the property.

name: Brit Hotel Essentiel de Granville
description:
Situated in the centre of Granville, Brit Hotel Essentiel de Granville is surrounded by gardens, just 1.5 km from the beach and 400 metres from Granville Train Station. It offers en suite rooms with free WiFi access and facilities for making hot drinks.

The light guest rooms have a flat-screen TV, facilities for making coffee and tea and a bottle of mineral water. They also have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

An English buffet breakfast is served every day at Brit Hotel Essentiel de Granville, and features sweet and savory products and homemade pastries. A snack bar is available during the reception opening hours.

Free private parking is provided on site. The hotel is 2.2 km from the Christian Dior Museum and from the ferry terminal providing access to the Anglo-Norman Isles of Jersey and Chausey. The property is also 22 km from Avranches and 40 km from Mont-Saint-Michel.

name: Château de La Ballue - Teritoria
description:
Set in a castle dating back to the 17th-Century, Château de La Ballue - Teritoria is classed as an Historic Monument and is surrounded by large gardens. The property is located between Saint-Malo and Mont Saint-Michel.

All rooms and suites are decorated in an elegant yet modern style with wooden period furniture. The private bathrooms include a bathrobe, slippers and free organic toiletries. Free WiFi access is also available in the room.

A buffet breakfast with local fresh products is available each morning and is served in the château's dining room.

Featuring old trees, topiaries and fountains, the remarkable gardens combine perspective, shade and light. Guests can use the outdoor spa and sauna, which has views of the Douves Garden and you can also relax on the deckchairs by the pond.

On-site private parking is provided and possible nearby activities include golfing.

name: Allobroges Park Hôtel
description:
Set in Annecy City Centre, this 3-star hotel is located a 10-minute walk from Annecy Chateau. It has a 24-hour reception and offers free WiFi access.

All guest room are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They offer work desk and an LCD TV. Some rooms feature exposed beams. The private bathrooms are fitted with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The onsite bar is open 24/7 and there is a terrace open during summer.

Lake Annecy is a 10-minute walk from Allobroges Hotel. Private Parking is available upon prior reservation only and subject to availability. Annecy Train Station is 260 metres away.

name: Hotel Novel Restaurant La Mamma
description:
Hotel Novel Restaurant La Mamma is located in Annecy, a 5-minute drive from the lake. Free public parking is possible at the property.

Each guest room has a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and free WiFi internet.

La Mamma serves traditional Italian or French cuisine and regional specialties. Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel bar.

Central Annecy is a 5-minute drive or bus travel from the hotel, where guests can visit Annecy Cathedral. Hotel Novel Restaurant La Mamma is 1.5 km from the Parc des Sports and 4 km from A41 highway.

name: Impérial Palace
description:
Located in the heart of the French Alps, Impérial Palace is a 4-star hotel is on the edge of Lake Annecy, 1.6 km from Annecy's centre. It offers air-conditioned accommodation, a spa and a casino. Free WiFi is provided.

Each guest room at L'Imperial Palace has a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Most rooms also have a balcony with a view of the lake and surrounding mountains or park. A courtesy tray with tea is available in each room.

The hotel’s gastronomic restaurant, La Voile, provides traditional French cuisine. Meals are served on a shaded terrace overlooking the lake. L'Impérial Palace also has a a more casual restaurant called La Brasserie, a bar, and a lounge where guests can enjoy homemade pastries, snacks and a full buffet breakfast.

The onsite 600 m² spa includes a swimming pool, an experience shower, a sauna, a hammam, an ice fountain, a spa bath and private treatment rooms. Impérial Palace offers also offers a business centre.

Free parking is available on site. Charging stations for electric cars are available at this property. Geneva International Airport is 40 km away and Annecy Train Station is 1.5 km from the hotel. Annecy Château is 2 km away.

name: Hôtel Le Pré Carré
description:
Le Pré Carré is a hotel located in the heart of Annecy, just 250 metres from Lake Annecy.

Guest rooms at Le Pré Carré are soundproofed and equipped with flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. All rooms are serviced by a lift.

The hotel offers a buffet breakfast, which can be served in your room. Le Pré Carré also provides a business centre, a 24-hour reception and on-site parking.

name: Les Canyons du Verdon
description:
Located in Verdon Regional Park, Les Canyons du Verdon features an outdoor swimming pool with sunbeds, a garden and pétanque facilities. Castillon Lake is just 4.5 km away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Decorated in fresh colours, all rooms feature a private entrance, while some include a balcony, pool views or garden view and a TV. They are complete with an en suite bathroom.

A breakfast buffet is offered at the hotel. Castellane village is conveniently located 250 metres away, allowing easy access to restaurants, bars and shops.

A conference room is available on request. It can accommodate up to 20 people.

Notre-Dame du Roc Chapel is only a 15-minute walk away and Saint-André-les-Alpes is a 20-minute drive from the hotel. Free Wi-Fi access is available in reception and free private parking is possible on site. Free storage for motorbikes is available on site.

name: Le Pélican
description:
Situated in Annecy, 37 km from Rochexpo, Le Pélican features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms have a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and gluten-free options.

Bourget Lake is 38 km from Le Pélican, while Stade de Genève is 43 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chambéry-Savoie Airport, 43 km from the accommodation.

name: Apparthotel Privilodges Le Royal
description:
Apparthotel Privilodges Le Royal is located 200 metres from Annecy Lake and 350 metres from the Palais de l’Isle Jail in the heart of the old town.  It offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi.

The air-conditioned studios and apartments at Privilodges Le Royal feature neutral decor. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a seating area are provided in each. Bed linen, towels are included in the price.

The kitchenettes are fully equipped with a fridge/freezer, hot-plates and a microwave oven.  A vacuum cleaner, iron and iron board are available upon request.

 At an additional cost, breakfast can be taken in your apartment and it is served as a buffet. Guests at Privilodges Le Royal Apparthotel also have access to a fitness room and luggage storage.

Annecy TGV Train Station is 650 metres from the hotel. Chateau d’Annecy is 600 metres away through the Old Town. A limited number of private parking spaces are available for an extra charge, upon reservation. Paying public parking is available nearby.

name: Hébé Hotel
description:
New hotel - Opening May 2021.

Hébé Hotel is located in the centre of Annecy, a 10-minute walk from the lake.

The hotel rooms each include a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with complimentary toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available each day. Annecy offers an array of bars and restaurants. The closest can be found just 300 metres from the hotel.

The property is located just 250 metres from the train station and bus station. Local sites of interest may include the town hall, St Maurice Church, and Saint-Pierre Cathedral.

name: Logis - Hôtel Restaurant Bellevue Annecy
description:
Featuring a restaurant, Logis - Hôtel Restaurant Bellevue Annecy is located 3 km from Lake Annecy and Annecy's town centre. Free WiFi is available throughout.

Accessed via a staircase, the rooms feature a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV.

Breakfast is served daily at Logis - Hôtel Restaurant Bellevue Annecy. The hotel’s restaurant serves traditional cuisine and guests can enjoy their meal on the terrace, weather permitting.

Un parking gratuit et public est disponible à proximité (sans réservation préalable).

Places de stationnement dans la rue


The hotel's meeting facilities can accommodate 30 people.

Logis - Hôtel Restaurant Bellevue Annecy is an 8-minute drive from Annecy's train station and Annecy–Haute Savoie Airport.

name: Premiere Classe Annecy Cran-Gevrier
description:
Premiere Classe Annecy Sud is located in Annecy and features a garden. This 1-star hotel offers free WiFi and is a 15-minute walk from Chateau d'Annecy.

All rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a private bathroom fitted with a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is served each morning at the property.

Lake Annecy and Annecy town centre with its shops, restaurants and market are located within 3 km from the hotel. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 47 km away.

name: Hotel de Savoie
description:
Set in a 17th-century building located in Annecy's old town, Hotel de Savoie is just 80 metres from Lake Annecy. It offers rooms with views of the canal or courtyard. Free WiFi is also available.

The individually decorated guestrooms are equipped with satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel adjoins the historical Church of Saint François and the entrance is through the church.

The Hotel de Savoie is 400 metres from the Love Bridge, 200 metres from Annecy Castle and 120 metres from Palais de l'Îsle.

name: Auberge de Baudinard sur Verdon
description:
L’Auberge de Baudinard, located besides Verdon Gorge River Canyon, is set in a Post Office from the 17th century. The hotel features a French restaurant that serves Provençal cuisine dishes and a terrace.

Rooms at L’Auberge de Baudinard are simply decorated. Some offer a view of the garden or the city. Another includes a terrace.

A continental breakfast is available upon request. You can sample your dishes in the dining room which has stone walls and a fireplace or on the terrace.

The hotel is located 4 km from Sainte-Croix Lake and 15 km from Aups. Les Arcs Train Station is 49 km away.

name: Villa Borghese, The Originals Relais
description:
Located in Gréoux-les-Bains, between the Gorges du Verdon and the Luberon, the Villa Borghese is situated in a park surrounded by 100-year old oak trees. It features a heated outdoor swimming pool with a terrace and a wellness centre.

The intimate rooms feature garden views, air conditioning and a TV with satellite channels. The en suite bathroom is equipped with a bath tub and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.

The on-site gastronomic restaurant, La Table de Pauline, serves breakfast each morning as well as Provençal cuisine which has been recommended in travel and restaurant guide books. For a relaxed midday meal guests can eat at the Côté Jardin.

A tennis court and sauna are also available on site. Villa Borghese is 14 km from the A51 motorway and 16 km from Manosque. The Aix-en-Provence TGV station is 70 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Auberge des Salles
description:
Situated in Les Salles-sur-Verdon, Auberge des Salles features a terrace with panoramic views of Lake de Sainte-Croix and the surrounding Verdon Natural Park. Hiking, fishing, and swimming are within 10 minutes' walk of the property.

Rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels and private bathrooms with either a bath or shower and a toilet. Some rooms have balconies with lake views and other rooms overlook the village and surrounding hills. A kettle is available upon request subject to availability.

The restaurant has a panoramic terrace on the lake of Sainte-Croix serving dinner everyday.

A buffet breakfast with hot drinks, orange juice, croissants, fresh bread with jams, honey and butter is served daily for a supplement. There is a bar on site.

The entrance to the Verdon Gorge is 6 km away and the village of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie is a 20-minute drive away. Les Arcs-Draguignan Train Station is 55 km away and the Hyeres Airport is 115 km away. Free private parking and free WiFi are available at the property.

name: Séjours & Affaires Annecy Le Pont Neuf
description:
The Séjours & Affaires Annecy Le Pont Neuf is located 3 km from Lake Annecy and 1 km from Annecy’s historic centre. It provides access to La Clusaz and Grand-Bornand ski resorts, 45 minutes away by car.

Ideal for both short-term and longer stays, these comfortable apartments include free WiFi and modern amenities. A buffet breakfast is available from Monday to Friday at an additional cost.

The Séjours & Affaires Annecy Le Pont Neuf is located in Cran Gevrier and is near to shops, restaurants and local transport services.

Annecy Train Station is a 15-minute walk away and parking is available for an additional charge. Semnoz Ski Resort is a 30-minute drive away.

name: ibis Styles Annecy Centre Gare
description:
ibis Styles Annecy Centre Gare is a 5-minute walk from Annecy Train Station and a 15-minute riverside walk from the old city and Lake Annecy. It offers free WiFi access and a 24-hour reception with bicycle storage.

A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and air conditioning feature in all of the rooms at ibis Style Annecy Centre Gare. Some of the rooms offer a private balcony.

A buffet breakfast is offered every morning. Guests can relax at the bar with an aperitif before heading to the several restaurants, just a 2-minute walk from the hotel.

 A private car park is available for an additional charge, upon reservation. Limited spots are available. The A41 motorway is 3 km away.

name: Gabrielle hôtel
description:
Located in the heart of Verdon National Park, Gabrielle hôtel is situated in the village of Aiguines. It overlooks Sainte Croix Lake, where you can go canoeing or rent pedal boats.

All rooms have an en-suite bathroom with a hairdryer, TV and electric blinds.

A continental breakfast is served every morning.

Gabrielle hôtel is surrounded by many hiking trails and guests can enjoy cycling, windsurfing or visit the vineyards of Provence.

name: La Bastide du Calalou; BW Signature Collection
description:
Bastide Du Calalou is located a 30-minute drive from the Gorges du Verdon and a 20-minute drive from the Sainte-Croix Lake. It features a heated, outdoor swimming pool, a tennis court and elegant guestrooms that overlook the Aups Valley.

Rooms at Bastide Du Calalou are equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms also have a DVD and video player.

A full breakfast buffet is served daily and Bastide’s restaurant serves regional cuisine, prepared with local produce. Guests can enjoy lunch and dinner in the restaurant or on the terrace.

Bastide Du Calalou is close to the village of Tourtour and the black truffle market, which is the third largest in France and open from December to April.

name: Le Splendid Hotel Lac D'Annecy - Handwritten Collection
description:
The property is facing the lake of Annecy and located in the centre of the old town of Annecy, a couple of paces of the shopping streets. We are also close to the cinemas, theatre and the best restaurants.

The rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

You will find us on the banks of the Vassé canal, facing the lawn of Champ de Mars, next to the Pier for the lake tour in boat and beach at 200 metres. A fitness room is available.

name: Hôtel Spa L'Ermitage
description:
Set in a 2-hectare park in the Verdon Regional Nature Park, Hôtel Restaurant L'Ermitage features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, 3 terraces, a bar, a restaurant and panoramic views of the mountain.

The rooms at Hôtel Restaurant L'Ermitage feature a balcony, en suite facilities with bath, free toiletries and a hairdryer, and a flat-screen TV. They also offer views of the pool. Some rooms have air conditioning.

Breakfast, lunch and dinner can be reserved upon arrival. The restaurant serves local and traditional cuisine, and the bar offers a wide range of cocktails all year long.

Hôtel Restaurant L'Ermitage is 5 km from the Verdon Gorge and the Lake of Sainte Croix is 800 metres away.  Nearby outdoor activities include hiking, swimming in the Lake, paragliding and canyoning. Free parking and free WiFi are available on site.

name: Studi-Hôtel Résidence Plein Voile
description:
Located in Les-Salles-sur-Verdon, Studi-Hôtel Résidence Plein Voile is just 200 metres from Sainte-Croix Lake and offers a garden and terrace. The Gorges du Verdon are 10 km away.

Decorated in a simple style, all rooms feature a wardrobe and private bathroom with free toiletries, while some also offer a balcony and views of the lake. Guest have access to the refrigerator.

A continental breakfast can be served each morning at Résidence Plein Voile. A bar, pizzeria and restaurant are conveniently situated just 50 metres from the property.

Watersports activities can be found 200 metres away at the lake and Moustiers Sainte-Marie is 12 km away. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the public areas and free public parking is possible at a location nearby.

name: Ma Petite Auberge
description:
Set in the Verdon Regional Nature Park, a 1-minute walk from the Verdon River and 5 km from Castillon Lake, Ma petite Auberge offers a traditional restaurant, a garden and a terrace.  A public swimming pool is located 100 metres from the property.

The heated rooms offer a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom is fitted with a bath or a shower and includes free toiletries.  Some offer a view of the terrace and the village’s place.

A continental breakfast is available every morning, and you can enjoy lunch and dinner in the park beside the 100-year-old Tilia Tree. Grocers can be found within 1 km.

It is 40 km from Dignes Train Station. Grasse is located 65 km from Ma Petite Auberge, while Cannes is 82 km away. A free, private car park is available on site.

name: Le Vieux Château
description:
Situated in an 18th-century building, Le Vieux Château features rooms with free Wi-Fi, a bar and a terrace. Set in the centre of Aiguines, it opens on a Provençal-style square with bars and shops.

With views of the village, all of the rooms are located on the 2nd floor and include a private bathroom with hairdryer, shower and free toiletries.

A French breakfast is served every morning. You can also enjoy an ice cream at the bar or try one of the Provençal specialties proposed at the hotel’s restaurant which is closed every Thursday evening and Friday all day.

You can go sailing on the Sainte Croix Lake, which is 8 km away, or visit the Museum of Prehistory in Quinson, a 40-minute drive away. Le Vieux Château is accessible via the A51 motorway.

name: Hotel du Levant
description:
Located in Castellane, in the Verdon Regional Nature Park, Hotel du Levant features a restaurant and terrasse and free WiFi access in public areas. A secured garage is also available for guest at an extra cost.

All rooms at Hotel du Levant features a flat-screen TV, a desk and a wardrobe and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. Daily cleaning is made at the property and towels and toiletries are provided for free.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning in the restaurant. The hotel’s restaurant serves French cuisine.

Hotel du Levant is 6.2 km from Lac de Castillon, 65 km from Grasse and 82 km from Cannes.

name: Campanile Annecy Centre - Gare
description:
Campanile Annecy Centre - Gare offers pet-friendly accommodation in Annecy. The property is 300 metres from Annecy Train Station, and a 5-minute walk from the old town and the lake. Free WiFi is provided throughout.

The rooms are air-conditioned, have a flat-screen TV, a desk and include a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property, and guests can enjoy their breakfast in the breakfast room or on the terrace.

Palais de l’île is 500 metres from Campanile Annecy Centre - Gare, while Chateau d'Annecy is 600 metres from the property. Lyon Saint Exupery Airport is 120 km away.

name: ibis Annecy Centre Vieille Ville
description:
Located just 700 metres from Lake Annecy, ibis Annecy Centre Vieille Ville features a 24-hour front desk, a luggage storage room and free WiFi. Public parking is available nearby at a surcharge, depending on availability.

The guest rooms are equipped with a desk, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:30.. Guests can also relax with a drink at the ibis Annecy Centre Vieille Ville’s bar.

Annecy Train Station is just 500 metres away from the hotel.

name: Mercure Annecy Centre
description:
Located in the heart of Annecy, 500 meters from the lake, the old city and 200 metres from the TGV train station, Mercure Annecy Centre offers comfortable accommodation and a warm welcome.

The hotel features air-conditioned rooms offering a courtesy tray, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free WiFi access.

A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast room on site, or a continental breakfast is available in the guest's room upon request. An express breakfast is also possible.

Geneva International Airport is 47 km away and public parking is possible 100 metres from the hotel.

name: Les Z'hirondelles
description:
Les Z'hirondelles is just 1.7 km from the centre of Annecy, near the Old Town and the SNCF Train Station. Its furnished apartments are a 10-minute drive from Lake Annecy.

All of the apartments at Les Z'hirondelles are completely furnished and have free Wi-Fi. Each apartment has a kitchen with a refrigerator, hot plate, toaster; microwave oven and cookware. Bed linen is provided.

Each apartment also includes a private parking place on site or in the garage.

name: Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy
description:
Featuring 4-star accommodation, Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy is set in Annecy, 2.1 km from Palais de l Ile and 2.2 km from Chateau d'Annecy. The property is close to several noted attractions, around 1.7 km from Bridge of Love and around 1.8 km from Bonlieu Performing Arts Centre. The property is close to popular attractions like Annecy School of Art, Annecy Town Hall and Annecy Court House.

All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with air conditioning, and selected rooms also offer a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. The hotel features a restaurant open for lunch and diner with a terrace facing the Lake of Annecy.

The property boasts an indoor swimming pool, with sauna, hammam, hot tub and fitness room with free access. Spa massages and yoga session are available at an extra cost.

Guests can find 2 private parking on site (indoor and outdoor) available at an extra cost.

Non-stop information is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French.

Annecy Court House is 2 km from Rivage Hôtel & Spa Annecy, while Church of St. Francis is 2.1 km from the property. Chambéry-Savoie Airport is 37 km away.

name: Le Verdon
description:
Located just 300 meters from a spa that offers massages, thermal treatments and mud treatments in Gréoux-les-Bains, hotel Le Verdon offers air-conditioned rooms with a terrace and balcony .


Free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV feature in the guest rooms. Each room is elegantly decorated in pastel tones, and the en suite bathrooms include a bathrobe, hairdryer and free toiletries.

A breakfast is available daily at an additional cost . The bar is open every day and guests can enjoy their drinks on the terrace in fine weather.

Lake Esparron is only 15 km away, where you can enjoy canoeing and kayaking. The hotel is accessible via the A51 motorway, 13 km away.

name: Hotel Les Cavalets
description:
Offering an outdoor pool and panoramic views of Sainte-Croix Lake, Les Cavalets is located in Bauduen. Free WiFi access is available in public areas.

Some rooms have a balcony or a terrace and offer lake views. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower.

At Les Cavalets you will find a garden and a bar. Guests can enjoy traditional Provençal meals from the hotel’s restaurant. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities and a shared lounge.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and canoeing. The property offers free parking.

The hotel is 2 km from Sainte Croix Lake. Nice Côte d'Azur Airport is 126 km away.

name: Auberge du Point Sublime
description:
Set in Rougon, 36 km from Château de Taulane Golf Course, Auberge du Point Sublime offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 2-star hotel has a restaurant and a bar. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room comes with a safety deposit box and some rooms also feature mountain views. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe.

Auberge du Point Sublime offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

You can play darts at the accommodation, and the area is popular for hiking and cycling.

The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 101 km from Auberge du Point Sublime.

name: Logis Hôtel Le Vieil Amandier
description:
Le Vieil Amandier is located in the small village of Trigance, in the heart of the Verdon Nature Reserve. Its facilities include an outdoor swimming pool and free on-site parking.

The guest rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Some rooms have direct access to the hotel garden.

Guests can have breakfast on the terrace overlooking the pool and Jabron Plain or in the main dining room. Restaurants can be found in the village.

Logis Hotel Le Vieil Amandier has a Spa & Wellness Centre including a sauna and a hot tub at an extra cost.

name: Auberge des crêtes
description:
Featuring a garden, Auberge des crêtes is situated in La Palud sur Verdon. Set in the Verdon Gorge Natural Park, the hotel provides a terrace and a shared lounge. Free WiFi is available.

All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom.

A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Auberge des crêtes offers a children's playground. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around La Palud sur Verdon, like fishing.

The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 107 km from the property.

name: Hotel Restaurant - Acacias Bellevue
description:
Located on the right bank of Annecy Lake, this hotel is 250 metres from the beach and the port. It offers free Wi-Fi access and a terrace with panoramic views, just 5km from Annecy town centre.

A TV is offered in all of the rooms at Hotel Restaurant - Acacias Bellevue. The rooms are simply decorated and the en suite bathrooms have a bathtub or a shower.

You can enjoy the continental breakfast on the terrace while admiring the views of the lake. The hotel also has a bar and restaurant, which serves freshly-caught fish and Savoyard specialties.

Private parking is free on site and Talloires Abbey is 7 km away. Local activities include hiking and mountain biking on Mont Veyrier, water sports on the lake and playing golf at Annecy golf club, 5.5 km away.

name: Aparthotel Adagio Annecy Centre
description:
Offering a fitness centre, Aparthotel Adagio Annecy Centre features studios and apartments with free WiFi in central Annecy. It is located 1 km from Lake Annecy, a 3-minute walk from the train station and it has a 24-hour reception.

Each air-conditioned apartment is equipped with a TV with satellite channels. All accommodation feature a seating area and have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All apartments have a kitchen equipped with a microwave, a fridge and a kettle.

A full buffet breakfast is provided every morning at an additional cost.

With paid private parking on site, the residence is just 500 metres from the castle and the old town. Seynod Theatre is 5 km away.

name: hotelF1 Annecy Argonay
description:
Featuring a 24-hour front desk, hotelF1 Annecy Argonay Rénové is a hotel located in Argonay, 45 minutes' drive from Chambéry. Free WiFi is available throughout.

Rooms include a flat-screen TV. Guests have access to a shared bathroom.

Breakfast can be enjoyed and vending machines are available on site. Guests can purchase microfibre towels at the hotel at an extra cost of EUR 3 each.

Geneva is 30 km from hotelF1 Annecy Argonay Rénové, while Annecy is 5 km from the property. Lyon - Saint Exupery Airport is 85 km away. Free private parking is available at the hotel.

name: Kyriad Annecy Nord - Epagny
description:
Kyriad Annecy Nord Epagny is located in Metz-Tessy. This air-conditioned property features a bar. Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel.

All rooms include a desk and a welcome tray with a selection of tea, coffee and milk. The private bathrooms come with a bath and free toiletries.

For guests who wish to explore the local sites, the Chateau d'Annecy Museum is a 14-minute drive from the property.

Annecy - Haute-Savoie - Mont Blanc Airport is just 2 km from the hotel and Annecy Train Station is 5 km away.

name: Hôtel Les Deux Lions
description:
Situated in Riez, 8 km from Lake of Sainte-Croix, Hôtel Les Deux Lions offers rooms overlooking the village or the hill. Free WiFi is provided.

Each room features floor to ceiling sliding doors, a balcony and a TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom has a bathtub and free toiletries.

A continental breakfast is available every morning if reserved the night before. It is served on the terrace or in the lounge.

The area is popular for water sports such as canoeing but also climbing, hiking or biking. A centre for hot air balloon flights is located 10 km away and lavender fields 3 km from the property.

Moustiers-Sainte-Marie and Les Gorges du Verdon are both located 15 km from Hôtel Les Deux Lions.​ Free private parking is available on site.

name: Premiere Classe Annecy Nord - Epagny
description:
Located close to motorway A41 and the expressway to Annecy, Premiere Classe Annecy Nord – Epagny offers free Wi-Fi access and free private parking on site. Lake Annecy is 10 km away.

Rooms offer a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and each room has a private bathroom with a shower. Restaurants and shops can be found within 1 km of the property at the commercial centre.

Aix-les-Bains is 35 km away and Geneva is 38 km from the hotel. Annecy Train Station is 5 km away and Lyon-Saint Éxupéry Airport is a 75-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Les Restanques De Moustiers
description:
This Provencal-style hotel has a floral terrace and is only 500 metres from the village of Moustiers Sainte Marie. Surrounded by nature, Hotel Les Restanques De Moustiers offers panoramic views.

Guest rooms are decorated in warm colours with floor-to-ceiling windows allowing plenty of natural light. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV and feature a private bathroom.

Hotel Les Restanques De Moustiers serves a daily buffet breakfast which can be enjoyed on the terrace.  In the evenings guests can relax with a drink at the bar.

The hotel is only 5 km from the Sainte-Croix Lake, where there are opportunities for canoeing, sailing and swimming. The Gorges du Verdon are 5 km away and free private parking is available on site.

name: Hôtel Particulier des Lumières
description:
Hôtel Particulier des Lumières is located in the centre of Moustiers-Sainte-Marie, 29 km from Gréoux-les-Bains. Manosque is 35 km away. Free WiFi is offered .

Some units have a terrace and/or balcony with mountains or river views. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, fitted with a dishwasher, an oven, and a toaster.

Free use of bicycles is available at the property and the area is popular for cycling. The area is popular for fishing and hiking. Digne-les-Bains is 27 km from Hôtel Particulier des Lumières. The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 82 km from the property.

name: Le Relais Notre Dame
description:
Located at the entrance to Quinson village, next to the prehistoric museum, Le Relais Notre Dame is 300 metres from the Verdon River and a 20-minute drive from Sainte-Croix Lake. The property features an outdoor swimming pool and a restaurant with a terrace.

Combining a modern and Mediterranean décor, all rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi. The private bathrooms have either a bathtub or shower and offer complimentary toiletries upon arrival.

Breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast room or in guests’ rooms. The hotel’s restaurant offers a seasonal menu with fresh, local produce, accompanied by a range of wines from the bar.

During their stay guests are invited to relax on the sunloungers by the swimming pool, or enjoy the colourful gardens. Additional facilities at this hotel include free private parking available on site.

name: Le Mas de La Crémaillère
description:
Only 1 km from central Gréoux-les-Bains, this hotel is 300 metres from a spa centre offering massage, thermal and mud treatments.  A swimming pool, a restaurant and a bar with garden terrace feature on site.

Decorated in pastel tones, the air-conditioned rooms at Le Mas de La Crémaillère have balconies. Some open onto a private garden with outside furniture. Additional facilities include a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and a fridge.

A breakfast is available daily at an additional cost. The hotel’s restaurant serves southern Provençal dishes made from seasonal, locally grown produce. A bar offering a wide range of drinks can be found on site.

Only 15 km both from Manosque and Lac d’Esparron, Le Mas de La Crémaillère provides free shuttle to the town centre. Free, private parking and Wi-Fi access via hotspot are available on site.

name: Cote Ouest
description:
Facing Lake Annecy, Cote Ouest is a 15-minute drive from Annecy Train Station. It offers self-catering accommodation, free Wi-Fi throughout, and a continental breakfast is available at a supplement.

The apartments feature a flat-screen TV with a DVD player and a terrace with views of the surrounding mountains and lake. Each bedroom has a wardrobe and the private bathrooms include a shower and hairdryer.

The fully-equipped kitchens have a dishwasher, refrigerator, oven, a coffee machine and kitchenware. Bakeries, shops and restaurants can be found within walking distance. Ironing and laundry facilities are also provided, and a concierge service, bike rental and in-room breakfast service are available.

Nearby outdoor activities include water activities on Lake Annecy during summer, as well as hiking and paragliding. There is a private beach located next to the property offering special offers and activities for guests. In the winter Cote Ouest offers a shuttle service to numerous ski resorts, which are within 35 km of the property.

name: Résidence les Grands Pins
description:
Résidence les Grands Pins gives direct access to Gréoux-les-Bains thermal baths and spa in the Provence region. It offers self-catering studio apartments with free Wi-Fi access and views of the garden and surrounding mountains.

Each studio includes a living area with a balcony and an equipped kitchenette and a flat-screen TV. The bathroom has a shower.

You will find shops and restaurants within 100 metres from Résidence les Grands Pins. Free private parking is available outdoors, and there is a covered private parking for a surcharge.

name: Hôtel Spa Les Alpes
description:
Ideally located near the famous Gorges du Verdon and Lavender Route, the hotel offers 3-star accommodation close to the Templars Castle in Gréoux-les-Bains, just 14 km from Valensole.

Hôtel Spa Les Alpes features air-conditioned rooms in exceptional surroundings, an outdoor swimming pool and free on-site parking. The restaurant serves both traditional and contemporary cuisine and features a shady terrace.

Gréoux-les-Bains is a charming Provencal village known for its pure thermal waters and its large choice of activities (spa, traditional markets, museums, churches, excursions, water sports and casino).

name: Hôtel Restaurant Villa Riva
description:
Located in the heart of Veyrier-du-Lac, on the banks of Lake Annecy, the hotel offers a warm welcome all year round.

Set near the resort of Aravis and offering outdoor activities such as hiking and skiing,  Hôtel Restaurant Villa Riva offers ideal accommodation for your leisure stay.

The business traveller has not been forgotten either. In addition to free Wi-Fi, this hotel also features meeting facilities.

A private garage is available with an extra cost, upon prior reservation.

name: Hotel Le Moulin du Château
description:
Le Moulin Du Château is a former olive oil mill, located in Saint-Laurent-du-Verdon, Provence. It offers rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The hotel also has a lounge, terrace and a garden surrounded by the Verdon Nature Park. The original mill room is now used as a games room with pool table and library.

The hotel's restaurant serves organic seasonal cuisine.

Guests have free access to the nearby tennis court and there are canoeing and hiking facilities nearby.

Le Moulin Du Château is close to the Grand Canyon and the Lake of Ste-Croix. Aix-en-Provence is an hour’s drive away.

name: Le Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg
description:
Offering city views, Le Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg is an accommodation situated in Sélestat, 24 km from House of the Heads and 24 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. It is set 14 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and offers free WiFi plus a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 21 km from Colmar Expo.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Colmar Train Station is 25 km from the apartment, while Würth Museum is 27 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 39 km from Le Château du Haut-Koenigsbourg.

name: Hotel Le Provence - Restaurant Le Styx
description:
Located in La Palud, Hotel Le Provence - Restaurant Le Styx offers a garden. The property has a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Grill/bbq cuisine. The accommodation provides free WiFi.

At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The rooms include a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is served daily at the property and the restaurant serves local cuisine.

The area is popular for cycling, hiking and climbing.

Verdon Gorge is 5 km from Hotel Le Provence - Restaurant Le Styx.

name: Gîte du Figuier 4 à 6 personnes Sélestat Centre-Alsace
description:
Offering barbecue facilities and quiet street view, Gîte du Figuier 4 à 6 personnes Sélestat Centre-Alsace is set in Sélestat, 25 km from House of the Heads and 25 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church. The 3-star apartment features inner courtyard views and is 22 km from Colmar Expo. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle is 15 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

The apartment has a picnic area and a terrace.

Colmar Train Station is 26 km from Gîte du Figuier 4 à 6 personnes Sélestat Centre-Alsace, while Würth Museum is 26 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 38 km from the accommodation.

name: Gite Villa Avril piscine- jacuzzi- sauna - 15 Pers-proche Europapark
description:
Gite Villa Avril piscine- jacuzzi- sauna - 15 Pers-proche Europapark is a recently renovated villa in Sélestat, where guests can makes the most of its outdoor swimming pool, spa and wellness centre and garden. This property offers access to a terrace, table tennis, free private parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 14 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle.

Boasting a game console, the spacious villa has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, 2 living rooms with a seating area and a dining area, 5 bedrooms, and 4 bathrooms with a hot tub and a bath. Guests can enjoy an ambient stay in their soundproof room with parquet floors and a fireplace. The villa offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

Barbecue facilities are at guests' disposal and guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Colmar Expo is 21 km from the villa, while House of the Heads is 24 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 39 km from Gite Villa Avril piscine- jacuzzi- sauna - 15 Pers-proche Europapark.

name: Gite Le Caveau Sélestat - 30min EuropaPark
description:
Set 42 km from Strasbourg and 21 km from Colmar, Gites de Sélestat offers an appartment in a former wine-cellar in Sélestat. The unit is 31 km from Europa Park and its aqua park.

There is a seating area and a kitchen complete with an oven, a microwave and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are provided in this apartment.

Haut-Koenigsbourg Castle is 15 km away, while La Montagne des Singes is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 34 km from Gites de Sélestat.

name: La Pause Pétillante
description:
La Pause Pétillante is located in Sélestat, 25 km from Würth Museum, 25 km from Saint-Martin Collegiate Church, as well as 26 km from Colmar Train Station. With free private parking, the property is 15 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle and 22 km from Colmar Expo. The property is non-smoking and is situated 25 km from House of the Heads.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Europa-Park Main Entrance is 38 km from the apartment, while Rohrschollen Nature Reserve is 44 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 39 km from La Pause Pétillante.

name: - 1 - Appartement charmant moderne 5 pers T3 73m2
description:
Offering city views, - 1 - Appartement charmant moderne 5 pers T3 73m2 is an accommodation set in Sélestat, 21 km from Colmar Expo and 24 km from House of the Heads. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are accessible at the apartment free of charge. The property is non-smoking and is situated 14 km from Le Haut Koenigsbourg Castle.

This apartment features 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Saint-Martin Collegiate Church is 24 km from - 1 - Appartement charmant moderne 5 pers T3 73m2, while Colmar Train Station is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Strasbourg International Airport, 39 km from the accommodation.
